segments.text: What a mess in this kitchen; the sink is flooding the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is too absorbed in her dish drying to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got water lapping at her feet, and she just keeps going.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor cabinets are ruined with water streaming down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And now the kids are up to no good with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that unstable stool, risking a nasty fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone supervising them properly?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just egging him on, reaching for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They shouldn't be sneaking treats like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is slippery now; someone will break something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is calm, but inside it's chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This negligence makes me so frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn around, lady, before it's too late!
segments.speaker: PAR
